summary: Email correspondence between legal parties regarding the jury questionnaire for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial, discussing formatting changes and sharing a joint proposed voir dire document. This shows trial preparation activities in October 2021.

events.title: Jury Questionnaire Preparation
events.description: Legal parties exchange documents related to the jury questionnaire for Ghislaine Maxwell's trial, discussing formatting changes and sharing a joint proposed voir dire document.

keyFacts: Document shows trial preparation activities for Ghislaine Maxwell's case in October 2021
Legal parties were working on jury questionnaire and voir dire documents
Email discusses formatting changes (red to green, blue to purple) for the jury questionnaire
A joint proposed voir dire document was shared between parties
